technical-data.invention-title: SYSTEM ZUM AUSGLEICH DES RAMMENFALLS IN EINER WERKZEUGMASCHINE
SYSTEM FOR COMPENSATING FOR THE RAM DROP IN A MACHINE-TOOL
SYSTÈME DE COMPENSATION DE LA CHUTE DU BÉLIER DANS UNE MACHINE OUTIL

description.p: The present invention relates to systems for ram drop compensation used in the field of machine tools, and more specifically in milling machines, proposing to that end a compensation system based on bending counter-guides correcting the deviation induced in the ram and therefore in the head of the tool.
The search for precision and parts having a finish of better quality is a continuous improvement process for manufacturers in the machine tool field.

Clients demand increasingly smaller tolerances in machined parts, and the response to this need is to maintain a constant deviation-free path in the machining process, such as for example, maintaining a perfect perpendicularity of the tool with respect to the work plane.

The deviations induced in the ram and therefore in the head of the tool due to the gravitational effect induced by the weight of the assembly as this assembly moves away from the column of the machine by a transverse movement, cause precision errors in the positioning of the tool on the part to be machined.

These precision errors can be corrected by means of using devices managed by numerical control (CNC), but when the tool has moved away from the movable elements of the machine, any deviation occurring is multiplied by the distance, being more complicated to correct said error by means of numerical control programming.

Based on this concept, there are different systems for correcting the deviation of the ram in machine tools, such as milling machines, caused by the weight of the ram itself and of its head during a transverse translation movement, these systems being based on devices operated by means of rotation systems or elements.

Italian patent IT1318293 discloses a machine tool such as a milling machine having a system for correcting ram drop based on a set of pivots performing an eccentric rotational movement by means of the action of a geared motor, achieving the lifting of the ram to counteract the pitching caused by its own weight.

Czech Republic patents CZ279142 (B6) and CZ278763 (B6) disclose two other systems based on a set of pulleys which, by means of the action of a counterweight, prevent the drop of the ram, maintaining its horizontal position during the translation movement thereof when it moves away from the column.

Italian patent IT1311789 relates to a device for compensating for the mandrel drop, preferably in the horizontal direction, by means of the action of a pulley and chain system acting on the ram, preventing its drop.
French patent FR-A-2 506 649 discloses a machine tool according to the preamble of claim 1.

According to the present invention, there is proposed a system for correcting the errors resulting from the drop of the ram in a milling machine or the like by means of the action of bending counter-guides causing a rise of the ram as it moves away from the column of the machine, whereby achieving a perfect horizontal position of the ram during its entire translation movement and a perfect perpendicular position of the working tool.

The system object of the invention is made up of at least one, preferably two, perforated plates which act as a bending counter-guide, a fixed sliding block and at least one movable sliding block being arranged on each plate although there will preferably be two movable sliding blocks, which fixed and movable sliding blocks are linked with a conventional guide for the transverse movement of the ram with respect to the column of the machine.

A continuous measuring control controls the drop of the ram by means of checking its transverse movement and the vertical position of its head, sending a signal to an operating assembly acting on the counter-guide plates, deforming them and driving the movable sliding blocks, causing the lifting of the ram and thus correcting its translation movement.

The concept distinguishing the system object of the invention from the systems based on rotational elements described above is the elastic bending deformation of the counter-guide plates which can be provided with notches in their side profiles to favor bending precisely at said points.

A compensation system for compensating for the drop of the ram is thus achieved which, due to its constructive and functional features, is very advantageous, acquiring its own identity and preferred character for the application function for which it is intended in relation to obtaining a perfectly horizontal exit of the ram from the column of the corresponding machine and a perfectly vertical arrangement of the tool.

description.p: The object of the invention relates to a compensation system for compensating the drop of the ram used in machine tools, for example in milling machines, to achieve a perfectly horizontal exit of the ram from the column of the machine and a perfectly vertical arrangement of the tool.

As observed in Figure 1, the system object of the invention is made up of a vertical translation carriage (1) on which there is located at least one perforated plate (2) and preferably two plates (2) which act as a bending counter-guide, a fixed sliding block (3) and at least one movable sliding block being arranged on each of said plates (2), although there will preferably be two movable sliding blocks (4, 5) as depicted in the attached drawings. The fixed sliding block (3) and the movable sliding blocks (4, 5) are linked with a conventional guide (not depicted) for the transverse movement of the ram (6) with respect to the column (7) of the application machine tool according to Figure 3.

The fixed sliding blocks (3) are held to the carriage (1) (see Figures 8 and 8A) by means of stops (8) which are located halfway between the side profile of the respective plate (2) and a face defined in an inner housing (16) of the carriage (1), preventing any type of movement, these sliding blocks (3) thus being a fixed point on which the entire system swings. The movable sliding blocks (4, 5) are only held to the plates (2) but not to the carriage (1), as can be observed in Figures 9 and 11, such that they can have a slight rotational movement as a result of a small allowance existing between the side profiles of the plate (2) and the faces of the inner housing (16) of the carriage (1).
Figures 6 and 7 show how the plates (2) have notches (9) at one end of their side profiles allowing elastic deformation of said plates (2), the bending thereof being favored at said points.

The system object of the invention has a continuous measuring control based, for example, on an absolute encoder reading the actual position of the ram (6) and the head (10) during the translation movement of the assembly with respect to the column (7) of the machine.

The absolute encoder thereby sends a set point signal to an operating assembly (11) which can be made up of a gear motor, followed by a coupling, and a planetary roller screw support or similar solutions, which operating assembly (11) pushes the plates (2) attached to one another by supports (14) by means of a strongly demultiplied movement, i.e., slow but with great force, deforming the plates (2) and driving the movable sliding blocks (4, 5) (approximately 0.1 mm), causing the rise of the ram (6) and correcting the error caused by its drop.

As shown in Figure 12, the continuous measuring control can be made up of a sensor (17) for measuring linear movement, specifically a linear detection device which is arranged on the carriage (1) and is associated with one of the movable sliding blocks (4, 5), it is preferably associated with the movable sliding block (5) furthest away and in a higher position with respect to the head (10) carrying the working tool.

To prevent the effect of the drop caused by the weight itself of the ram and its head, the transverse movement of the ram is basically interpolated with the vertical movement thereof, different interpolation ramps being achieved depending on the type of head assembled in the machine tool.

Contact parts (12) for contacting with the guide (not depicted) for the transverse movement of the ram (6) through a damping material, for example turcite, minimizing friction are located between the movable sliding blocks (4, 5), a smoother movement being produced, reducing the equipment wear effect.

Likewise, flanges (13) are placed between the movable sliding blocks (4, 5) and the parts (12) for sliding adjustment, which flanges are anchored to the plates (2) by means of bushings having a smaller diameter than the holes in which they are fitted, thus allowing the rotation of the plates (2) but eliminating the deformation and lateral movement.

Sheets (15) of a damping material, preferably turcite the static friction coefficient of which is slightly less than dynamic friction coefficient, can also be placed between the plates (2) and the carriage (1), whereby achieving constant movement during the contact between the surface of the plates (2) and carriage (1), the occurrence of dynamic jerking (known as the stick-slip effect) being minimized.

It is also possible for the turcite sheets (15) to be provided with grooves for the free circulation of a lubricant (grease or oil) between the plates (2) and the carriage (1), which provides a damping effect to the entire assembly.
Based on the foregoing, a guiding system is thus obtained which allows correcting errors resulting from the drop of the ram and it can in turn work like a damping system.

claim.claim-text: Maschinenwerkzeug, umfassend: eine Säule (7), einen Schlitten (1) zur vertikalen Verschiebung auf der Säule (7) und einen von dem Schlitten (1) zur vertikalen Verschiebung getragenen Werkzeugschieber(6), der einen das Arbeitswerkzeug tragenden Kopf (10) und eine Führung zur Querbewegung des Werkzeugschiebers (6) in Bezug auf die Säule (7) enthält, und dadurch gekennzeichnet, dass auf dem Schlitten (1) eine Betätigungsanordnung (11) und wenigstens eine als eine biegsame Gegenführung fungierende perforierte Platte (2) angeordnet sind, wobei ein fixierter Gleitblock (3), der in Bezug auf den Schlitten (1) fixiert ist, und wenigstens ein bewegbarer Gleitblock (4, 5), der in Bezug auf den Schlitten (1) bewegbar ist, auf jeder der wenigstens einen perforierten Platte (2) angeordnet sind, wobei der fixierte Gleitblock (3) und der wenigstens eine bewegbare Gleitblock (4, 5) mit der Führung zur Querbewegung des Werkzeugschiebers (6) in Bezug auf die Säule (7) des Maschinenwerkzeugs verbunden sind, wobei die Betätigungsanordnung (11) dazu ausgelegt ist, die wenigstens eine perforierte Platte (2) zu deformieren und den wenigstens einen bewegbaren Gleitblock (4, 5) so zu ziehen, dass der Fall des Werkzeugschiebers (6) durch das gesteuerte Biegen der wenigstens einen perforierten Platte (2) kompensiert wird.

Maschinenwerkzeug nach Anspruch 1, dadurch gekennzeichnet, dass jeder fixierte Gleitblock (3) mittels eines Stoppers (8), der zwischen dem Seitenprofil der entsprechenden perforierten Platte (2) und einer in einem Innengehäuse (16) des Schlittens (1) definierten Fläche angeordnet ist, auf dem Schlitten (1) gehalten wird, wobei der fixierte Gleitblock (3) einen Punkt bestimmt, um den der Werkzeugschieber (6) in Bezug auf den Schlitten (1) schwingt.

Maschinenwerkzeug nach Anspruch 2, dadurch gekennzeichnet, dass jede perforierte Platte (2) Nuten (9) an einem Ende ihres Seitenprofils aufweist, die ein Biegen mittels elastischer Deformation an dem Punkt begünstigen, an dem der Werkzeugschieber (6) in Bezug auf den Schlitten (1) schwingt.
Maschinenwerkzeug nach Anspruch 1, dadurch gekennzeichnet, dass zwei bewegbare Gleitblöcke (4, 5) auf jeder perforierten Platte (2) vorgesehen sind.

Maschinenwerkzeug nach Anspruch 4, ferner umfassend Teile (12), die mit der Führung zur Querbewegung des Werkzeugschiebers (6) über ein Dämpfungsmaterial in Kontakt stehen und die zwischen den bewegbaren Gleitblöcken (4, 5) auf jeder perforierten Platte (2) angeordnet sind.

Maschinenwerkzeug nach Anspruch 5, dadurch gekennzeichnet, dass auf jeder perforierten Platte (2) Flansche (13) zur Gleiteinstellung zwischen den bewegbaren Gleitblöcken (4, 5) und den zwischen den bewegbaren Gleitblöcken (4, 5) angeordneten Teilen (12) angeordnet sind, wobei die Flansche (13) an den Platten (2) mittels Buchsen verankert sind, die deren Rotation erlauben.

Maschinenwerkzeug nach Anspruch 1, dadurch gekennzeichnet, dass ein mit Nuten versehenes Blech (15) aus einem Dämpfungsmaterial, vorzugsweise aus Turgit, zwischen der perforierten Platte (2) und dem Schlitten (1) angeordnet ist, das die Zirkulation eines Schmierstoffes ermöglicht, um einen Dämpfungseffekt bereitzustellen.

Maschinenwerkzeug nach Anspruch 1, dadurch gekennzeichnet, dass auf dem Schlitten (1) ein Sensor (17) zum Messen der linearen Bewegung, die mit einem von dem wenigstens einen bewegbaren Gleitblock (4, 5) assoziiert ist, angeordnet ist.

Maschinenwerkzeug nach Anspruch 8, wobei zwei bewegbare Gleitblöcke (4, 5) auf jeder perforierten Platte (2) angeordnet sind und der Sensor (17) mit dem bewegbaren Gleitblock (5) assoziiert ist, der sich am weitesten entfernt von dem und in der höchsten Position in Bezug auf den das Arbeitswerkzeug tragenden Kopf (10) befindet.

The machine tool according to claim 1, characterized in that each fixed sliding block (3) is held on the carriage (1) by means of a stop (8) located between the side profile of the respective perforated plate (2) and a face defined in an inner housing (16) of the carriage (1), said fixed sliding block (3) determining a point around which the ram (6) swings with respect to the carriage (1).

The machine tool according to claim 2, characterized in that each perforated plate (2) has notches (9) at one end of its side profile which favor bending by means of elastic deformation at the point around which the ram (6) swings with respect to the carriage (1).
The machine tool according to claim 1, characterized in that two movable sliding blocks (4,5) are arranged on each perforated plate (2).

The machine tool according to claim 4, further comprising parts (12) making contact with the guide for the transverse movement of the ram (6) through a damping material and located between the movable sliding blocks (4, 5) on each perforated plate (2).

The machine tool according to claim 5, characterized in that, on each perforated plate (2), flanges (13) for sliding adjustment are placed between the movable sliding blocks (4, 5) and said parts (12) located between the movable sliding blocks (4, 5), which flanges (13) are anchored to the plates (2) by means of bushings allowing the rotation thereof.

The machine tool according to claim 1, characterized in that a grooved sheet (15) of a damping material, preferably turcite, is placed between the perforated plate (2) and the carriage (1), allowing the circulation of a lubricant to provide a damping effect.

The machine tool according to claim 1, characterized in that there is arranged on the carriage (1) a sensor (17) for measuring linear movement associated with one of the at least one movable sliding block (4, 5).

The machine tool according to claim 8, wherein two movable sliding blocks (4,5) are arranged on each perforated plate (2) and said sensor (17) is associated with the movable sliding block (5) furthest and in the highest position with respect to the head (10) carrying the working tool.

Machine-outil comprenant : une colonne (7) ; un chariot de translation vertical (1) sur ladite colonne (7) ; et un bélier (6) porté par ledit chariot de translation vertical (1) et comprenant une tête (10) portant l'outil de travail et un guide pour le mouvement transversal du bélier (6) par rapport à ladite colonne (7) ; et caractérisée en ce que, sur ledit chariot (1), est positionné un ensemble opérationnel (11) et au moins une plaque perforée (2) agissant en tant que contre-guide flexible, un bloc de coulissement fixe (3), fixe par rapport audit chariot (1), et au moins un bloc de coulissement mobile (4, 5), mobile par rapport audit chariot (1), qui est agencé sur chacune desdites au moins une plaque perforée (2), lequel bloc de coulissement fixe (3) et au moins un bloc de coulissement mobile (4, 5) sont reliés avec ledit guide pour le mouvement transversal du bélier (6) par rapport à la colonne (7) de la machine-outil, ledit ensemble opérationnel (11) étant configuré pour déformer ladite au moins une plaque perforée (2) et traîner ledit au moins un bloc de coulissement mobile (4, 5), de sorte que la chute du bélier (6) est compensée au moyen de la flexion contrôlée de l'au moins une plaque perforée (2).

Machine-outil selon la revendication 1, caractérisée en ce que chaque bloc de coulissement fixe (3) est maintenu sur le chariot (1) au moyen d'une butée (8) située entre le profil latéral de la plaque perforée (2) respective et une face définie dans un boîtier interne (16) du chariot (1), ledit bloc de coulissement fixe (3) déterminant un point autour duquel le bélier (6) oscille par rapport au chariot (1).

Machine-outil selon la revendication 2, caractérisée en ce que chaque plaque perforée (2) a des encoches (9) au niveau d'une extrémité de son profil latéral qui favorisent la flexion au moyen de déformation élastique au niveau du point autour duquel le bélier (6) oscille par rapport au chariot (1).
Machine-outil selon la revendication 1, caractérisée en ce que deux blocs de coulissement mobiles (4, 5) sont agencés sur chaque plaque perforée (2).

Machine-outil selon la revendication 4, comprenant en outre des parties (12) établissant le contact avec le guide pour le mouvement transversal du bélier (6) par le biais d'un matériau d'amortissement et positionnées entre les blocs de coulissement mobiles (4, 5) sur chaque plaque perforée (2).

Machine-outil selon la revendication 5, caractérisée en ce que, sur chaque plaque perforée (2), des brides (13) pour l'ajustement de coulissement sont placées entre les blocs de coulissement mobiles (4, 5) et lesdites parties (12) positionnées entre les blocs de coulissement mobiles (4, 5), lesquelles brides (13) sont ancrées aux plaques (2) au moyen des douilles permettant leur rotation.

Machine-outil selon la revendication 1, caractérisée en ce que la feuille rainurée (15) d'un matériau d'amortissement, de préférence de la Turcite, est placée entre la plaque perforée (2) et le chariot (1), permettant la circulation d'un lubrifiant afin de fournir un effet d'amortissement.

Machine-outil selon la revendication 1, caractérisée en ce que, agencé sur le chariot (1), on trouve un capteur (17) pour mesurer le mouvement linéaire associé à l'un du au moins un bloc de coulissement mobile (4, 5).

Machine-outil selon la revendication 8, dans laquelle deux blocs de coulissement mobiles (4, 5) sont agencés sur chaque plaque perforée (2) et ledit capteur (17) est associé avec le bloc de coulissement mobile (5) le plus éloigné et dans la position la plus haute par rapport à la tête (10) portant l'outil de travail.
